      • getCopyOfContextMap

        public Map<String,​String> getCopyOfContextMap()
        Return a copy of the current thread's context map. null is returned if
        • The MDC functionality is disabled, c.f. setEnable, or
        • "return null when empty" is enabled, c.f. setReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet, and put has not been called.
        Specified by:
        getCopyOfContextMap in interface org.slf4j.spi.MDCAdapter
        Overrides:
        getCopyOfContextMap in class org.slf4j.helpers.BasicMDCAdapter
        Returns:
        A copy of the current thread's context map.

      • setContextMap

        public void setContextMap​(Map<String,​String> contextMap)
        Specified by:
        setContextMap in interface org.slf4j.spi.MDCAdapter
        Overrides:
        setContextMap in class org.slf4j.helpers.BasicMDCAdapter

      • setEnable

        public void setEnable​(boolean enable)
        Enable the MDC functionality for all threads.
        Parameters:
        enable - Whether to enable the MDC functionality. The default value is true.

      • setInherit

        public void setInherit​(boolean inherit)
        Define whether child threads inherit a copy of the MDC from its parent thread. Note that the copy is taken when the Thread is constructed. This affects all threads.
        Parameters:
        inherit - Whether to enable inheritance. The default value is false.

      • setAllowNullValues

        public void setAllowNullValues​(boolean allowNullValues)
        Define whether null values are allowed in the MDC. This affects all threads.
        Parameters:
        allowNullValues - Whether to allow nulls. The default value is true.

      • setReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet

        public void setReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet​(boolean returnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet)
        Define whether getCopyOfContextMap() returns null when no values have been set. This affects all threads.
        Parameters:
        returnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet - Whether to return null. The default value is false. If false, an empty map is returned instead.

      • getEnable

        public boolean getEnable()
        Whether the MDC functionality is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether the MDC functionality is enabled.

      • getInherit

        public boolean getInherit()
        Whether child threads inherit a copy of the MDC from its parent thread.
        Returns:
        Whether inheritance is enabled.

      • getAllowNullValues

        public boolean getAllowNullValues()
        Whether null values are allowed in the MDC.
        Returns:
        Whether nulls are allowed.

      • getReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet

        public boolean getReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet()
        Whether getCopyOfContextMap() returns null when no values have been set.
        Returns:
        Whether to return null.

      • restoreOptions

        public void restoreOptions()
        Reset the options to values defined by the static configuration. This undoes to changes made using setEnable(boolean), setInherit(boolean), setAllowNullValues(boolean), and setReturnNullCopyWhenMdcNotSet(boolean).

      • getInstance

        public static TestMDCAdapter getInstance()
        Access the current MDC adapter. Used to call the option setting methods.
